ing.item: Rye flour (use the coarse grind; preferably)
Wheat gluten (sometime called vital wheat gluten)

directions.step:
Date: Thu, 21 Mar 1996 14:22:39 -0500
From: Dotnapier@aol.com Add ingredients in order suggested by your bread machine manual. This is intended for a 3 cup bread maker, if your machine is smaller just scale it accordingly. Similarly, your bread maker may suggest using less than 1 TB yeast.
For a particularly festive bread try adding 1 TB basil 1 TB tarragon 1 tsp rosemary chopped garlic...
Posted by Ari Kornfeld <ari@perspective.com> to the Fatfree Digest [Volume 15 Issue 23] Feb. 23, 1995.
